description.english: Help us by buying the game in EA.
description.german: Hilf uns, indem du das Spiel im EA kaufst.

description.english: Gain enough experience defeating this creature to call yourself an expert.

description.english: Gain enough experience defeating this creature to call yourself an expert.

description.english: You have reached level 300! I just spilled my coffee!
description.german: Du hast Level 300 erreicht! Ich habe gerade meinen Kaffee verschüttet!

description.english: You have reached level 200! Holy sh*t!
description.german: Du hast Level 350 erreicht! Heilige Sche*sse!

description.english: You have reached level 400! You're unstoppable!
description.german: Du hast Level 400 erreicht! Du bist unaufhaltsam!

description.english: You have reached level 450! I can't get my head around it!
description.german: Du hast Level 450 erreicht! Ich kriege mich nicht mehr ein!

description.english: You have reached level 500! What's wrong with you?
description.german: Du hast Level 500 erreicht! Was läuft denn bei dir falsch?

description.english: You have reached level 1000! Perhaps you should go out for some fresh air?
description.german: Du hast Level 1000 erreicht! Vielleicht solltest du mal langsam an die frische Luft?

description.english: You have reached level 1500! You are right! MetaPhysical is the meaning of life.
description.german: Du hast Level 1500 erreicht! Du hast Recht! MetaPhysical ist der Sinn des Lebens!

displayName.english: Use the elevator for the first time!
displayName.german: Benutze den Aufzug zum ersten Mal!

description.english: Stairs? What is that? Can you eat it?
description.german: Treppen? Was ist das? Kann man das Essen?

description.english: Successfully complete your first Hunter's Crew mission!
description.german: Schließe deine erste Hunter´s Crew-Mission erfolgreich ab!

description.english: Fail on a Hunter's Crew mission!
description.german: Scheitere das erste mal bei einer Hunter´s Crew-Mission!

description.english: Send your first hunter to his death!
description.german: Schicke deinen ersten Jäger in den Tod!

description.english: Return to Billy and his bunker!
description.german: Kehre zu Billy und seinem Bunker zurück!

displayName.english: A guardian angel by your side.
